title: TheChunk
content:
[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]

[[>]]
[[module rate]]
[[/>]]

[[=]]
+ Welcome to the Chunk
[[/=]]

Wahoo, you found my author page! I'm The Chunk, intermittent author and Queer Trash™ enthusiast.

I might not have written your favorite article, but I may have written your favorite article's favorite article. If you read what I've written in the order listed below, you can watch me progressively become a worse author. 

------

[[=]]
+ Tales
[[/=]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="for Brandon"]]
++ [[[for Brandon]]] 
[%%created_at%%] 
[Rating: %%rating%%] 
[Comments: %%comments%%] 
[Last Comment: %%commented_at%%]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]

[[div class="blockquote"]]
[[module ListPages name="In Small Doses"]]
++ [[[In Small Doses]]] 
[%%created_at%%] 
[Rating: %%rating%%] 
[Comments: %%comments%%] 
[Last Comment: %%commented_at%%]
[[/module]]
[[/div]]
